review_blob: Good sumer beer.  Nice fruity and malty aroma.  Great label. definitely different than what you normally see.  Coll comic book type of look.  Over all not a really impressive beer, but I would never turn one down.  Bitter after taste, but not at all overwhelming.

The most drinkable IPA Ive tried.  Very well balanced with a hoppy flavor thats not overpowering.  Its easy to see why this beer is so popular in IPA markets.  Bitter aftertaste, but not the kind that make your tongue curl up.  Very well rounded beer that could easily be drank year round.

Tried this beer with the lady friend and she loved it.  My thoughts, honestly pretty good for flavored beer.  Not very sugary tasting like Im used to for flavored beer.  Refreshing, but sweet. This would go great with dessert.
beer_name: Sea Dog Wild Blueberry Wheat Ale

review_blob: Nice strong flavor with a light but bitter, fruity taste that brings out some grapefruit and peach.  Bold flavor would go well with a good food pairing.  Im not usually drawn to bitter beers, but for this one ill make an exception.  This is fantastic!

Nice fruity flavor with lots of undertones of other flavors.  A little bit of a bitter after taste that brings out a bit of a grapefruit flavor.  I have no real complaints, but there are a few beers I would choose over this one if I was out.
Heavy malt flavor.  Im not a big porter fan, but this is pretty good.  I think this would be great with a good food pairing.  Some coffee bean undertones and a bit of oakeyness.
Sweet honey nut aroma and after taste.  Rich deep flavor with notes of brown sugar.  Just the right amount of bitter and plenty of sweet.  Very drinkable and not too heavy.
Chuggable.... This beer is super easy to drink and has a nice fruity wheat flavor.  Great summer beer.  Smooth and easy for a hot summer day.  Sweet after taste.

Not quite the appearance of Guiness; however, I would choose this beer over a Guiness any day.  Great flavor with the milk sugar that adds a very rich undertone.  The nitro version is a little bit smoother, but this is a great beer any way you cut it.  Smooth enough to drink in the summer, but great for the winter.

Great easy drinking beer, particularly for the summer.  Nice full body and lots of sweet flavor sort of like a cider.  I doubt I would drink this year round, but its perfect on a hot day.  My girlfriend loves this beer as well, probably because its so fruity.

I think this beer is fantastic!  Yes, it is different.  not particularly hoppy, but I like the change of pace.  This beer is very smooth and there is not much carbonation to speak of, but I like the idea of a rich and fragrant flavor without the bitter after taste of an IPA.  Although I like this beer, I will admit that this beer is not traditional in the sense of its flavor or presentation.

I am not an IPA fan, nor do I like much of anything with a bitter taste; however, this IPA is not overpoweringly hoppy and not quite as bitter as some ive tried before.  The aftertaste is not quite as harsh as others that Ive had.  I would probably like this beer with the right foods.
Sweet with bubbly carbonation.  Flower taste and citrus aroma.  The after taste is a bit tart and brings out almost a bitter citrus flavor.
Bitter sweet taste. Refreshing, but doesnt have a very good after taste. A little flat. Overall I would choose this one as a notch above Keystone Light.
Very sweet and citrus flavored.  Easy drinking and refreshing.  Good beer for a hot summer afternoon.  Definitely a good one for the ladies.
